com.markussecundus.forms.elements.impl.layouts

Class BasicAbstractLayout.ChildrenListeners

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.markussecundus.forms.elements.impl.layouts.BasicAbstractLayout.ChildrenListeners
  • Enclosing class:
    BasicAbstractLayout<Rend,Pos,Scalar extends java.lang.Comparable<Scalar>>

    protected final class BasicAbstractLayout.ChildrenListeners
extends java.lang.Object
    Container class for all the listeners, that are automatically added to the delegates on childrenContainer, to make them easily refferentiable and possibly able to be deleted from the particular delegate if necessary.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      EventListener<Drawable<Rend,Pos>> ADDER_OF__ON_RESIZED_LISTENER
      Adds the onChildResizedAction delegate to the setter listener of size property of the drawable child being added.
      EventListener<java.lang.Object> IS_ELEMENT_GUARD
      Skips execution of the listener for all Objects attempted to be removed, that aren't instances of Element.
      EventListener<java.lang.Object> REMOVER_OF__ON_RESIZED_LISTENER
      Removes the onChildResizedAction delegate from the setter listener of size property of the drawable child being removed.
      EventListener<java.lang.Object> SIZE_CONSTRAINT_REMOVER__ON_UNCHILD
      Sets the _sizeConstraint of the drawable child being removed to null.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected ChildrenListeners()
